alert.note: Alert for Central Ventura County Valleys; Eastern San Fernando Valley; Malibu Coast; Southeastern Ventura County Valleys; Western San Fernando Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued January 05 at 1:06PM PST until January 07 at 7:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY EVENING THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Northwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...Central Ventura County Valleys, Malibu Coast, Western San Fernando Valley, Eastern San Fernando Valley and Southeastern Ventura County Valleys. * WHEN...From Saturday evening through Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down large objects such as trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Central Ventura County Valleys; Eastern San Fernando Valley; Malibu Coast; Southeastern Ventura County Valleys; Western San Fernando Valley
